divs: Sighting Detailsi watched a white unsteady object in the sky, then I saw another one, they blinked one would dissappear, and go into the other one, then come out, and repeat this again. I called my husband, and son and they also saw this happenning. they eventually dissappeared. this lasted for at least 15 to 20 minutes.I kind of always know where to see them.i called my husband and son to makesure that I was not mistaken. I slept good.
Summary: watched in sky one object, and another one blink and go into each one.
